statements: SELECT * FROM feedback ORDER BY feedback_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT customer_name, rating FROM feedback WHERE rating > 3
SELECT feedback_text FROM feedback WHERE customer_name = 'John Doe'
SELECT * FROM feedback WHERE rating BETWEEN 2 AND 4
SELECT customer_name, feedback_date FROM feedback ORDER BY feedback_date ASC
SELECT * FROM feedback WHERE rating > 3 ORDER BY feedback_date ASC
SELECT customer_name, feedback_text FROM feedback ORDER BY feedback_date DESC
SELECT AVG(rating) AS avg_rating, COUNT(*) AS total_feedback FROM feedback WHERE feedback_text LIKE '%great%'
SELECT customer_name, feedback_text, feedback_date FROM feedback WHERE feedback_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT customer_name, rating FROM feedback WHERE rating BETWEEN 2 AND 4 ORDER BY rating DESC
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT feedback_text, rating FROM customer_feedback WHERE customer_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM hotel_reviews WHERE rating BETWEEN 1 AND 3 ORDER BY review_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, review_text FROM hotel_reviews WHERE hotel_id = 456 ORDER BY review_id ASC;
SELECT feedback_id, rating FROM customer_feedback WHERE feedback_id IN (1, 5, 8);
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT customer_id, feedback_text FROM customer_feedback WHERE customer_id = 1001;
SELECT review_id, hotel_id, review_text FROM hotel_reviews WHERE rating = 5 ORDER BY review_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS total_reviews FROM hotel_reviews GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_reviews > 3;
SELECT c.customer_id, c.feedback_text, h.review_text FROM customer_feedback AS c INNER JOIN hotel_reviews AS h ON c.customer_id = h.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback;
SELECT rating, feedback_text FROM customer_feedback WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT review_text, rating FROM hotel_reviews WHERE hotel_id = 123;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(review_id) AS total_reviews FROM hotel_reviews GROUP BY customer_id ORDER BY total_reviews DESC;
SELECT hotel_id, SUM(improvement_cost) AS total_cost FROM hotel_improvement GROUP BY hotel_id ORDER BY total_cost DESC;
SELECT feedback_id, customer_id, rating, feedback_text FROM customer_feedback WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback WHERE customer_id = 100 ORDER BY feedback_id DESC;
SELECT hotel_id, AVG(rating) AS average_rating FROM hotel_reviews GROUP BY hotel_id HAVING COUNT(review_id) > 5;
SELECT review_text, rating FROM hotel_reviews WHERE rating >= 4 AND customer_id = 200 ORDER BY review_id ASC;
SELECT hotel_id, SUM(improvement_cost) AS total_cost FROM hotel_improvement GROUP BY hotel_id HAVING total_cost > 5000;
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback;
SELECT customer_id, review, rating FROM hotel_reviews WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT hotel_name, location FROM hotels WHERE rating >= 4.5;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE phone_number IS NULL;
SELECT review_id, hotel_id, customer_id, date_created FROM hotel_reviews ORDER BY date_created DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback WHERE rating = 5 ORDER BY feedback_id DESC;
SELECT hotel_name, location, rating FROM hotels WHERE rating > 4 ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%' ORDER BY customer_id ASC;
SELECT hotel_name, rating, location FROM hotels INNER JOIN hotel_reviews ON hotels.hotel_id = hotel_reviews.hotel_id WHERE hotel_reviews.rating > 4 ORDER BY rating DESC, location ASC;

SELECT customer_name, review, rating FROM customers INNER JOIN hotel_reviews ON customers.customer_id = hotel_reviews.customer_id WHERE hotel_reviews.rating < 3 ORDER BY customer_name ASC, rating ASC, review DESC;
SELECT * FROM feedback;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customer WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT hotel_name, location, rating_avg FROM hotel WHERE rating_avg > 4;
SELECT feedback_id, rating FROM feedback ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT review_id, reviewer_name, review_date FROM review WHERE review_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM feedback JOIN customer ON feedback.customer_id = customer.customer_id;
SELECT hotel_id, hotel_name, location FROM hotel WHERE rating_avg > 4.5;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customer WHERE customer_id IN (SELECT customer_id FROM feedback WHERE rating < 3);
SELECT employee_id, employee_name, job_title FROM employee ORDER BY employee_name ASC;
SELECT feedback_id, customer_id, AVG(rating) AS avg_rating FROM feedback GROUP BY feedback_id, customer_id;
